QUERY.DECLARATION: INSERT INTO customer_details ( First_Name,Middle_Name,Last_Name,SSN,Address_Id,Payment_Id,Status,Start_Date,Active,End_Date,Distributor_Id,orderstatus,Created_By,Modified_By,Last_Modified_Date,SSN_proof, Address_proof, Completed_application, T_C_acceptance, ltd_poa_signed ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?,?,?,?,?,?,? )

SELECT First_Name,Middle_Name,Last_Name,SSN,Address_Id,Payment_Id,Status,Start_Date,Active,End_Date,Distributor_Id,Created_By,Modified_By,Last_Modified_Date,Customer_Id,orderstatus,SSN_proof, Address_proof, Completed_application, T_C_acceptance, ltd_poa_signed FROM customer_details WHERE 1=1 AND Customer_Id = ?

SELECT a.First_Name,a.Middle_Name,a.Last_Name,a.SSN,a.Address_Id,a.Payment_Id,a.Status,a.Start_Date,a.Active,a.End_Date,a.Distributor_Id,a.Created_By,a.Modified_By,a.Last_Modified_Date,a.Customer_Id, b.First_Name as distributorname, c.amount,c.status as paymentstatus,a.orderstatus,a.SSN_proof, a.Address_proof,a.Completed_application, a.T_C_acceptance, a.ltd_poa_signed FROM customer_details a left join distributor_details b on b.Distributor_Id = a.Distributor_Id left join payment_details c on a.Payment_Id = c.Payment_Id WHERE 1=1 AND a.Status = 'N' AND a.First_Name LIKE ? AND a.Last_Name LIKE ? AND b.First_Name LIKE ?

SELECT a.First_Name,a.Middle_Name,a.Last_Name,a.SSN,a.Address_Id,a.Payment_Id,a.Status,a.Start_Date,a.Active,a.End_Date,a.Distributor_Id,a.Created_By,a.Modified_By,a.Last_Modified_Date,a.Customer_Id,b.First_Name as distributorname, c.amount,c.status as paymentstatus,a.orderstatus,a.SSN_proof, a.Address_proof,a.Completed_application, a.T_C_acceptance, a.ltd_poa_signed FROM customer_details a left join distributor_details b on b.Distributor_Id = a.Distributor_Id left join payment_details c on a.Payment_Id = c.Payment_Id WHERE 1=1 AND a.Status = 'N'

SELECT a.First_Name,a.Middle_Name,a.Last_Name,a.SSN,a.Address_Id,a.Payment_Id,a.Status,a.Start_Date,a.Active,a.End_Date,a.Distributor_Id,a.Created_By,a.Modified_By,a.Last_Modified_Date,a.Customer_Id,b.First_Name as distributorname, c.amount,c.status as paymentstatus,a.orderstatus,a.SSN_proof, a.Address_proof,a.Completed_application, a.T_C_acceptance, a.ltd_poa_signed FROM customer_details a left join distributor_details b on b.Distributor_Id = a.Distributor_Id left join payment_details c on a.Payment_Id = c.Payment_Id WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Status = 'P' or a.Status = 'R' or a.Status = 'C')

SELECT a.First_Name,a.Middle_Name,a.Last_Name,a.SSN,a.Address_Id,a.Payment_Id,a.Status,a.Start_Date,a.Active,a.End_Date,a.Distributor_Id,a.Created_By,a.Modified_By,a.Last_Modified_Date,a.Customer_Id,b.First_Name as distributorname, c.amount,c.status as paymentstatus,a.orderstatus,a.SSN_proof, a.Address_proof,a.Completed_application, a.T_C_acceptance, a.ltd_poa_signed FROM customer_details a left join distributor_details b on b.Distributor_Id = a.Distributor_Id left join payment_details c on a.Payment_Id = c.Payment_Id WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Status = 'P' or a.Status = 'R' or a.Status = 'C') AND a.First_Name LIKE ? AND a.Last_Name LIKE ? AND b.First_Name LIKE ? AND a.orderstatus like ?
DELETE FROM customer_details WHERE 1=1 AND Customer_Id = ?
UPDATE customer_details SET Status = 'P' WHERE 1=1 AND Customer_Id = ?
UPDATE customer_details SET Status = 'R' WHERE 1=1 AND Customer_Id = ?
UPDATE customer_details SET Status = 'C' WHERE 1=1 AND Customer_Id = ?

UPDATE customer_details SET First_Name = ? ,Middle_Name = ? ,Last_Name = ? ,SSN = ? ,Address_Id = ? ,Payment_Id = ? ,Status = ? ,Start_Date = ? ,Active = ? ,End_Date = ? ,Distributor_Id = ? ,Created_By = ? ,Modified_By = ? ,Last_Modified_Date = ?,orderstatus =?,SSN_proof = ? ,Address_proof=?,Completed_application = ?, T_C_acceptance=?, ltd_poa_signed=? WHERE 1=1 AND Customer_Id = ?
